availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Martin A. McClelland (Trimble County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth McClelland. Father of William McClelland, Robert McClelland, Evira McClelland, Coleman McClelland, and Martin J. McClelland. Resident of Trimble County, Kentucky in 1840. Farmer in Trimble County in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 325.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 2, p. 392.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 222.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Burrows District, p. 209B.
